first_para: Polly Billington (born 1967) is a former BBC journalist who worked on the Today programme before becoming a special advisor to Ed Miliband. She was the media director for his successful bid in the Labour leadership election, 2010. Billington is Labour's prospective parliamentary candidate for Thurrock at the next election, and a Labour Party official; she no longer works for Ed Miliband.

full.extract: Polly Billington (born 1967) is a former BBC journalist who worked on the Today programme before becoming a special advisor to Ed Miliband. She was the media director for his successful bid in the Labour leadership election, 2010. Billington is Labour's prospective parliamentary candidate for Thurrock at the next election, and a Labour Party official; she no longer works for Ed Miliband.
full.title: Polly Billington
